= Ruby =

[[rails]]

irb: interactive ruby

== syntax ==
注释
{{{class="brush: ruby"
# commit
=begin
commit
commit
=end
# no ';'
}}}

变量
{{{class="brush: ruby"
x='56' # local variable
@x = 'xxx' # instance variable
@@x = 'xxx' # class variable( static variable)
$x = 'xxx' # global variable
Mart = 'xxx' # constant, 首字母或全部字母大写
x,y,z = 1,2,3
a,b,c = 1,'xx',3.21
}}}

String
{{{class="brush: ruby"
s = 'xx cc bb ee ww qq'
s[3..7]
s[-6..-1]
}}}

字符串输入输出
{{{class="brush: ruby"
puts 'hello world'
s = 'xxx'
puts s
# #{..}表达式输出运算结果
puts 'hello, #{s}'
#{2+2} #==> 4
#{ARGV[0]}
puts 'hello' + 'world'
puts 'hello' << 'world'
puts 'hello' * 3
5.times { print 'hello' }
puts 'hello' + `ruby -v`
hi = 'hello %s'
puts hi % 'hebi'
'%s %s' % ['hello', 'world']
sprintf('hello, %s', 'hebi') # ==> 'hello hebi'
printf('hello, %s', 'hebi') # ==> hello hebi
}}}

re
{{{class="brush: ruby"
s = 'xxx bbb kkk'
s.scan(/\w+/) # ==> ['xxx', 'bbb', 'kkk']
}}}

系统命令
{{{class="brush: ruby"
system "echo 'hello world'"
system 'echo', 'hello', world'
}}}

eval
`eval "puts 'hello world'" # ==> hello world`
in shell, -e means eval
`ruby -e "puts 'hello world'"`
`ruby -e "puts 'hello world'" -e "puts 'hello world'"`

gets
{{{class="brush: ruby"
hello = gets
puts hello
}}}

def
{{{class="brush: ruby"
def func
    puts 'hello'
end
func
}}}

yield
{{{class="brush: ruby"
def func
    yield # exec codes in the brace
end
func { puts 'hello' }
}}}

each
{{{class="brush: ruby"
# array
# |e| 代表来自数组的元素 
['hello', 'world'].each { |e| print e }
}}}

proc
{{{class="brush: ruby"
prc = lambda { |name| puts "hello "+name }
prc.call 'hebi'
}}}

if
{{{class="brush: ruby"
if 1 == 1
    print 'true'
elsif 2 == 2
    print '2'
else
    print '3'
end
}}}

== ruby.taobao.org ==
gem is very slow:
use ruby.taobao.org
$ gem sources --remove https://rubygems.org/
$ gem sources -a http://ruby.taobao.org/

for bundle, in Gemfile:
source 'http://ruby.taobao.org'


== Gem Install Packets ==
sudo gem install rails -V # verbose
gem install xxx -v 1.1.0 # install a specific version of a ruby gem
gem # show help
gem help
gem list
gem uninstall xxx
gem search xxx # search remote
gem dep rails
gem update --system

== bundle ==
bundle show

== Trouble Shooting ==
can't use gem install on mac:

`ARCHFLAGS=-Wno-error=unused-command-line-argument-hard-error-in-future sudo gem install GemName # wrong!!`
`sudo ARCHFLAGS=-Wno-error=unused-command-line-argument-hard-error-in-future gem install rails -V # yes`
